WorkItem.ClosedComment: I've already fixed this for next version
WorkItem.Description: Two examples: Love's Prisoner from Bronjahm in HFoS and Arcane Loops of Anger from Devourer of Souls in HFoS both indicate the HHoR as their source. Checking the Wowhead page, both items are correctly shown to drop from HFoS. The error persists even when refreshing the information from Wowhead. The correct information is obtained when refreshing from the Armory.
